Translations.Text: Baliyagala okufuluma mu muliro ng’ate sibaakugufuluma, bagenda kutuukwako ebibonerezo e byolubeerera

Omubbi omusajja n'omubbi omukazi mubatemeko emikono gyaabwe bombi, nga mpeera (kibonerezo) yeekyo kyebakoze, era nga kyakulabirako ekyassibwawo Katonda ekikanga abalala, bulijjo Katonda ye nantakubwa ku mukono mugoba nsonga
Oyo yenna eyeenenya oluvanyuma lwokweyisa kwe obubi naalongoosa, mazima Katonda akkiriza okwenenya kwe, anti bulijjo mazima Katonda musonyiyi musaasizi
Tomanyi nti mazima ddala obufuzi bweggulu omusanvu ne nsi bwa Katonda, abonereza gwaba ayagadde ate naasonyiwa gwaba ayagadde, bulijjo Katonda muyinza ku buli kintu kyonna

Owange ggwe omubaka, tebakunakuwazanga abo abavuganya mu kuwakanya(obwannabbi bwo), mu abo abagamba n'emimwa gyaabwe nti tukkirizza so nga e mitima gyabwe tegikkiriza. Ne mu Bayudaaya abakkiriza e bigambo byobulimba, era abawuliriza kulwa bantu abalala ababa tebazze mu nkungaanazo nebakyusa e bigambo okubiggya mu bifo byabyo nga bagamba (bannaabwe nti), bwemuweebwa kino mukitwale, bwekitabaweebwa mwekeke, naye Katonda gwaba ayagadde okugezesa toyinza kumuyamba mu kintu kyonna ewa Katonda, abo beebo Katonda baatayagala kutukuza mitima gyaabwe, obuswaavu buli ku bo kuno ku nsi, era ne ku lunaku lw’enkomerero bagenda kussibwaako ebibonerezo ebikambwe
